name: Home
story: You wake up to plan out for the day, which is going to be eventful, and starts reading your python book. At home you restore a bit of health and money,
nav: Press 1 to go to the Fight club, Press 2 to go to the food court, Press 3 to go to sports arena

name: Fight club
story: You have reached fight club, now you can fight in a ring, which costs you $5
nav: press 1 to go to Ring 1 to fight, press 2 to to Ring 2 to fight, press 3 to go to to Ring 3 to fight

name: Ring 1
story: You are fighting with a pro wrestler........and you lost it! you lost helath by 10
nav: press 1 to go Fight club, press 2 to go to Ring 2, press 3 to go to Ring4

name: Ring 2
story: You are fighting with a noob wrestler........and you won ! and lost health by 1.
nav: press 1 to go Fight club, press 2 to go to Ring 1, press 3 to go to Ring 4

name: Ring 3
story: You are fighting with a sumo wrestler........and he sat on you!  you lost helath by 5
nav: press 1 to go to  food court, press 2 to go to Sports arena, press 3 to go to Ring 4

name: Ring 4
story: You are fighting with a superstar John Cena .......and you tickled him and won the match ! you lost health by 2. Also won a superstar belt as a token.
nav: press 1 to go back to the Fight club, press 2 to goto the foodcourt, press 3 to back to Home

name: Food court
story: You are at the food court, you can eat at different places here!
nav: press 1 to go to PIzza shop, press 2 to go to coffee Shop, press 3 to go to Indian sweet shop

name: Pizza shop
story: Thank you for visiting Pizza shop, Bill was $5
nav: press 1 to go Food court, press 2 to go to Coffee shop, press 3 to go to Burger shop

name: Coffee shop
story: Thank you for visiting Coffee shop, Bill was $2
nav: press 1 to go to the food ,press 2 to go to PIzza shop ,press 3 to go to Burger shop

name: Indian sweets
story: Thank you for visiting Sweet shop, Bill was $3
nav: press 1 to go to the sports arena ,press 2 to go to the garden,press 3 to go Burger Shop

name: Burger shop
story: Thank you for visiting Burger shop, Bill was $7
nav: press 1 to go to the food ,press 2 to go to Sports arena ,press 3 to go to Basement

name: Sports arena
story: You are at the Sports Arena, you can play and won different awards here. It takes up 10% helath
nav: Press 1 to go to play basketball, Press 2 to go to Cambrian. Press 3 to go to the Basketball field

name: Basketball field
story: You are playing Basketball, and your team won the match, and you won the best player award
nav: Press 1 to go to the back yard. Press 2 to go to the computer lab. Press 3 to go to the car wash

name: Soccer filed
story: You are playing Soccer, and your team won the match, and you won the best player award
nav: Press 1 to go back to arena. Press 2 to go to Basketball field. Press 3 to go to Basketball filed

name: Cricket ground
story: You are playing Cricket, and your team won the match, and you won the best player award
nav: Press 1 to go to Garden, press 2 to go to the Music concert and press 3 to go to the basketball field

name: Basketball field
story: You are playing Basketball, and your team lost the match because of you.
nav: Press 1 to go back to sports arena, 2 to go to Garden, 3 to go back to Home

name: Garden
story: Garden is a great place to go and water the plants and gain some oxygen, thank you for volunteering.
nav: Press 1 to go back to the basement, 2 to go to Cambrian awards, 3 to Music concert

name: Basement
story: You are ready for the next event.
nav: press 1 to go to Garden,press 2 to go to the cambrian awards, press 3 to go to Music concert

name: Cambrian Awards Meet
story: You Won the president's award congratulations.

name: Music Concert
story: You missed the president's award in order to attend music concert, But You enjoyed a lot there as well.
